c1.name: Raging Vortex
c1.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.
c1.description: Palm Vortex pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.

c3.name: Sweeping Gust
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gust Surge</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Cherishing Breezes
c4.descriptionRaw: Reduces DMG taken while casting <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> by 10%.
c4.description: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.

c5.name: Vortex Stellaris
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Palm Vortex by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Intertwined Winds
c6.descriptionRaw:
Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Gust Surge</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
c6.description:
